00037 template<typename _Tp>
00038 class point_bins{
00039 
00040   // Concept requirements
00041 #ifdef __GLIBCXX__
00042   __glibcxx_class_requires(_Tp, _ForwardIteratorConcept);
00043 #else
00044   __glibcpp_class_requires(_Tp, _ForwardIteratorConcept);
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 public:
00048   struct three_idz{
00049     int idz[3];
00050   };
00051 
00052   template<typename T>
00053   struct point_bin_t{
00054     std::vector<const my_float_t *> positions; 
00055     std::vector<T> assoc_data;   
00056   };
00057 
00058   typedef typename std::vector< point_bin_t< _Tp > > bin_vec;
00059   typedef typename bin_vec::iterator bin_vi;
00060   typedef typename bin_vec::const_iterator bin_vci;
00061   typedef typename std::multimap<bin_vci, const my_float_t*> bin2vert_mmap;
00062 
00065   point_bins()
00066   { init(); }
00067 
00068   point_bins(_Tp begin, _Tp end, my_float_t bin_width = 4.5)
00069   {
00070     init(); 
00071     setup_grid(begin, end, bin_width);
00072   }
00073 
00074   point_bins(const point_bins<_Tp> &other) 
00075   {
00076     do_copy(other);
00077   }
00078 
00079   const point_bins&
00080   operator=(const point_bins& other)
00081   {
00082     if(&other != this){
00083       do_copy(other);
00084     }
00085     return *this;
00086   }
00087 
00088   void
00089   setup_grid(_Tp begin, _Tp end, const my_float_t bin_width)
00090   {
00091   // Have STL (or is it g++?) check if the given range is valid
00092 #ifdef __GLIBCXX__
00093     __glibcxx_requires_valid_range(begin, end);
00094 #else
00095     __glibcpp_requires_valid_range(begin, end);
00096 #endif
00097 
00098     if(A_bins_are_setup){
00099       std::cerr << "Bins are already setup - cannot set them up again\n";
00100       return;
00101     }
00102     A_begin = begin;
00103     A_end = end;
00104     A_bin_width = bin_width + 0.01;
00105     A_bin_width_inv = 1.0 / bin_width;
00106     if(begin == end) return;
00107 
00108     my_float_t min_pos[3], max_pos[3];
00109     get_min_max_coords(begin, end, min_pos, max_pos);
00110     determine_space(min_pos, max_pos, A_lower_corner, A_upper_corner,
00111                     A_num_bins);
00112     populate_grid(begin, end, A_bin_width, &A_bins);
00113 //    A_bins_for_moved_pts->resize(A_num_bins[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2]);
00114 
00115     A_plane_normals[0] = 1.0;
00116     A_plane_normals[4] = 1.0;
00117     A_plane_normals[8] = 1.0;
00118     std::copy(A_lower_corner, A_lower_corner + 3, A_orig_lower);
00119     std::copy(A_upper_corner, A_upper_corner + 3, A_orig_upper);
00120 
00121     A_bins_are_setup = true;
00122   }
00123 
00125 
00128   void
00129   transform_bins(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00130   {
00131     if(!A_bins_are_setup) return;
00132 
00133     // Rotate the normals by R
00134     my_float_t scratch[9];
00135     std::copy(A_plane_normals, A_plane_normals + 9, scratch);
00136     my_gemm(3, 3, 3, 1.0, scratch, 3, R, 3, A_plane_normals, 3, 0.0);
00137 
00138     // Transform upper and lower corner
00139     std::copy(A_upper_corner, A_upper_corner + 3, scratch);
00140     std::copy(T, T + 3, A_upper_corner);
00141     my_gemm(1, 3, 3, 1.0, scratch, 3, R, 3, A_upper_corner, 3, 1.0);
00142     std::copy(A_lower_corner, A_lower_corner + 3, scratch);
00143     std::copy(T, T + 3, A_lower_corner);
00144     my_gemm(1, 3, 3, 1.0, scratch, 3, R, 3, A_lower_corner, 3, 1.0);
00145 
00146     A_bins_are_transformed = true;
00147   }
00148 
00149   void
00150   inverse_transform_bins(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00151   {
00152     if(!A_bins_are_setup) return;
00153 
00154     my_float_t R_transpose[9];
00155     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00156       for(int j = 0; j < 3; ++j) R_transpose[3*j + i] = R[3*i + j];
00157     my_float_t T_inverse[3];
00158     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) T_inverse[i] = -1.0 * T[i];
00159 
00160     // Rotate the normals by the transpose of R
00161     my_float_t scratch[9];
00162     std::copy(A_plane_normals, A_plane_normals + 9, scratch);
00163     my_gemm(3, 3, 3, 1.0, scratch, 3, R_transpose, 3, A_plane_normals, 3, 0.0);
00164 
00165     // Transform upper and lower corner (C_prime = (C - T)R^t)
00166     std::copy(A_upper_corner, A_upper_corner + 3, scratch);
00167     my_axpy(3, 1.0, T_inverse, 1, scratch, 1);
00168     my_gemm(1, 3, 3, 1.0, scratch, 3, R_transpose, 3, A_upper_corner, 3, 0.0);
00169     std::copy(A_lower_corner, A_lower_corner + 3, scratch);
00170     my_axpy(3, 1.0, T_inverse, 1, scratch, 1);
00171     my_gemm(1, 3, 3, 1.0, scratch, 3, R_transpose, 3, A_lower_corner, 3, 0.0);
00172 
00173     A_bins_are_transformed = true;
00174   }
00175 
00176   void
00177   revert()
00178   {
00179     if(!A_bins_are_setup) return;
00180 
00181     std::copy(A_orig_lower, A_orig_lower + 3, A_lower_corner);
00182     std::copy(A_orig_upper, A_orig_upper + 3, A_upper_corner);
00183     std::fill(A_plane_normals, A_plane_normals + 9, 0.0);
00184     A_plane_normals[0] = 1.0;
00185     A_plane_normals[4] = 1.0;
00186     A_plane_normals[8] = 1.0;
00187     A_bins_are_transformed = false;
00188   }
00189 
00190   void
00191   get_min_max_coords(_Tp begin, _Tp end, my_float_t *min_pos, 
00192                      my_float_t *max_pos)
00193   {
00194     std::copy(begin->pos, begin->pos + 3, min_pos);
00195     std::copy(begin->pos, begin->pos + 3, max_pos);
00196     for(_Tp my_iter = begin; my_iter != end; ++my_iter)
00197       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00198         if(max_pos[i] < my_iter->pos[i]) max_pos[i] = my_iter->pos[i];
00199         if(my_iter->pos[i] < min_pos[i]) min_pos[i] = my_iter->pos[i];
00200       }
00201   }
00202 
00203   void
00204   determine_space(const my_float_t *min_pos, const my_float_t *max_pos,
00205                   my_float_t *min_corner, my_float_t *max_corner, int *num_bins)
00206   {
00208     // any of the "edge" bins
00209     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00210       min_corner[i] =
00211         A_bin_width * std::floor(min_pos[i] / A_bin_width) - 3*A_bin_width;
00212       max_corner[i] =
00213         A_bin_width * std::ceil(max_pos[i] / A_bin_width) + 3*A_bin_width;
00214       num_bins[i] =
00215         static_cast<int>(std::ceil((max_corner[i] - min_corner[i])
00216                                    / A_bin_width));
00217     }
00218   }
00219 
00220   void
00221   populate_grid(_Tp begin, _Tp end, const my_float_t bin_width,
00222                 bin_vec *bins)
00223   {
00224     bins->resize(A_num_bins[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2]);
00225     A_bins_of_moved_pts.resize(A_num_bins[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2]);
00226 //    A_current_bin_idz.resize(A_num_bins[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2]);
00227 
00228     for(_Tp curr = begin; curr != end; ++curr){
00229       three_idz my_idz;
00230       int *idx = my_idz.idz;
00231       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00232         idx[i] = 
00233           static_cast<int>(std::floor((curr->pos[i] - A_lower_corner[i]) *
00234                                       A_bin_width_inv));
00235       
00236       A_orig_bin_idz.push_back(my_idz);
00237 
00238       for(int i = -1; i < 2; ++i){
00239         bin_vi cbin = A_bins.begin();
00240         cbin += (idx[0] + i) * A_num_bins[1] * A_num_bins[2];
00241         cbin += (idx[1] - 1) * A_num_bins[2];
00242         for(int j = -1; j < 2; ++j){
00243           for(int k = -1; k < 2; ++k){
00244             (cbin + idx[2] + k)->positions.push_back(curr->pos);
00245             (cbin + idx[2] + k)->assoc_data.push_back(curr);
00246           }
00247           cbin += A_num_bins[2];
00248         }
00249       }
00250     }
00251     A_current_bin_idz.resize(A_orig_bin_idz.size());
00252     std::copy(A_orig_bin_idz.begin(), A_orig_bin_idz.end(),
00253               A_current_bin_idz.begin());
00254   }
00255 
00256   ~point_bins() 
00257   { 
00258     init();
00259   }
00260 
00261   inline void
00262   get_bin(const my_float_t *pt, bin_vci *nbrs, bin_vci *moved_nbrs) const
00263   {
00264     if(!A_bins_are_setup){
00265       *nbrs = A_bins.end();
00266       *moved_nbrs = A_bins.end();
00267       warn("point_bins", "get_bin", 
00268            "Cannot get neighborhood before setting up grid");
00269       return;
00270     }
00271 
00272     int idx[3];
00273     if(get_bin_idz(pt, idx)){
00274       *nbrs = A_bins.begin() + (idx[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2] + 
00275                                 idx[1]*A_num_bins[2] + idx[2]);
00276       *moved_nbrs = A_bins_of_moved_pts.begin() + 
00277                     (idx[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2] + 
00278                      idx[1]*A_num_bins[2] + idx[2]);
00279     }else{
00280      *nbrs = A_bins.end();
00281      *moved_nbrs = A_bins.end();
00282     }
00283   }

00297   inline bin_vci
00298   bins_end() const
00299   { return A_bins.end(); }
00300 
00302   inline bin_vci
00303   moved_bins_end() const
00304   { return A_bins_of_moved_pts.end(); }

00306   const bool
00307   bins_are_setup() const

00311   void
00312   update_point_bin(_Tp &data)
00313   {
00314     // At the present we only want to support updating if the template 
00315     // parameter is a random access iterator
00316 #ifdef __GLIBCXX__
00317     __glibcxx_function_requires(_RandomAccessIteratorConcept<_Tp>);
00318 #else
00319     __glibcpp_function_requires(_RandomAccessIteratorConcept<_Tp>);
00320 #endif
00321 
00322     if(data < A_begin || data >= A_end){
00323       std::cerr << "Data point is not in the bins, cannot update bin "
00324                 << "locations\n";
00325       return;
00326     }
00327 
00328     // Compute the bin for the pt, given the current position
00329     size_t idx = data - A_begin;
00330     int idz[3];
00331     if(!get_bin_idz(data->pos, idz)){
00332       std::cerr << "A point has moved out side of the bins, please increase "
00333                 << "the buffer around the\ninitial positions and rerun the "
00334                 << "computations\n";
00335       return;
00336     }
00337 
00338     // First check if we have not moved from the current bin
00339     const int *curr_bin_idz = A_current_bin_idz[idx].idz;
00340     if(idz[0] == curr_bin_idz[0] && idz[1] == curr_bin_idz[1] &&
00341        idz[2] == curr_bin_idz[2]) return;
00342 
00343     // Next check if we have moved to the point's original bin
00344     const int *orig_bin_idz = A_orig_bin_idz[idx].idz;
00345     if(idz[0] == orig_bin_idz[0] && idz[1] == orig_bin_idz[1] &&
00346        idz[2] == orig_bin_idz[2]){
00347       std::copy(orig_bin_idz, orig_bin_idz + 3, curr_bin_idz);
00348       return;
00349     }
00350 
00351     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00352       if(idz[i] <= 0 or (idz[i] + 1) >= A_num_bins[i]){
00353         std::cerr << "A point has moved almost out side of the bins, please increase "
00354                   << "the buffer around the\ninitial positions and rerun the "
00355                   << "computations\n";
00356         return;
00357       }
00358     }
00359 
00360     for(int i = -1; i < 2; ++i){
00361       bin_vi cbin = A_bins_of_moved_pts.begin();
00362       cbin += (idz[0] + i) * A_num_bins[1] * A_num_bins[2];
00363       cbin += (idz[1] - 1) * A_num_bins[2];
00364       for(int j = -1; j < 2; ++j){
00365         for(int k = -1; k < 2; ++k){
00366           (cbin + idz[2] + k)->positions.push_back(data->pos);
00367           (cbin + idz[2] + k)->assoc_data.push_back(data);
00368         }
00369         cbin += A_num_bins[2];
00370       }
00371     }
00372 
00373 #if 0
00374     // this isn't difficult, but will take some time to write or think
00375     // about it -- at the present I need the prototype of the method more
00376     // than testing this piece of code
00377 
00378     int idz_diff[3];
00379     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) idz_diff[i] = idz[i] - curr_bin_idz[i];
00380 
00381     if((idz[0] == -1 || idz[0] == 1) && idz[1] == 0 && idz[2] == 0){
00382     
00383     }else if(idz[0] == 0 && (idz[1] == -1 || idz[1] == 1) && idz[2] == 0){
00384 
00385     }else if(idz[0] == 0 && idz[1] == 0 && (idz[2] == -1 || idz[2] == 1)){
00386 
00387     }else{
00388       // We aren't saving that much so just add it to everything?
00389       
00390     }
00391 #endif
00392 
00393     std::copy(idz, idz + 3, A_current_bin_idz[idx].idz);
00394   }

00396   void
00397   remove_moved_points_from_bins()
00398   {
00399     bin_vi b;
00400     for(b = A_bins_of_moved_pts.begin(); b < A_bins_of_moved_pts.end(); ++b)
00401       b->clear();
00402 
00403     std::copy(A_orig_bin_idz.begin(), A_orig_bin_idz.end(), 
00404               A_current_bin_idz.begin());
00405   }

00407   void
00408   write_bounds(std::ostream &out) const
00409   {
00410     std::cout << "A_upper_corner: " << A_upper_corner[0] << " "
00411               << A_upper_corner[1] << " " << A_upper_corner[2] << "\n";
00412     std::cout << "A_lower_corner: " << A_lower_corner[0] << " "
00413               << A_lower_corner[1] << " " << A_lower_corner[2] << "\n";
00414     std::cout << "Normals:" ;
00415     for(int i = 0; i < 9; ++i) std::cout << " " << A_plane_normals[i];
00416   }

00420   void
00421   init()
00422   {
00423     A_bin_width = my_float_max;
00424     std::fill(A_upper_corner, A_upper_corner + 3, 0.0);
00425     std::fill(A_lower_corner, A_lower_corner + 3, 0.0);
00426     std::fill(A_num_bins, A_num_bins + 3, 0);
00427     A_bins_are_setup = false;
00428     A_bins_are_transformed = false;
00429     std::fill(A_plane_normals, A_plane_normals + 9, 0.0);
00430   }

00433 
00437   void
00438   do_copy(const point_bins<_Tp> &src)
00439   {
00440     init();
00441     A_bins_are_setup = src.A_bins_are_setup;
00442     A_bins_are_transformed = src.A_bins_are_transformed;
00443     A_bin_width = src.A_bin_width;
00444     A_bin_width_inv = src.A_bin_width_inv;
00445     std::copy(src.A_upper_corner, src.A_upper_corner + 3, A_upper_corner);
00446     std::copy(src.A_lower_corner, src.A_lower_corner + 3, A_lower_corner);
00447     std::copy(src.A_num_bins, src.A_num_bins + 3, A_num_bins);
00448     std::copy(src.A_plane_normals, src.A_plane_normals + 9, A_plane_normals);
00449 
00450     A_bins.reserve(src.A_bins.size());
00451     for(bin_vci b = src.A_bins.begin(); b < src.A_bins.end(); ++b)
00452       A_bins.push_back(*b);
00453   
00454     A_current_bin_idz.resize(src.A_current_bin_idz.size());
00455     std::copy(src.A_current_bin_idz.begin(), src.A_current_bin_idz.end(),
00456               A_current_bin_idz.begin());
00457     A_orig_bin_idz.resize(src.A_orig_bin_idz.size());
00458     std::copy(src.A_orig_bin_idz.begin(), src.A_orig_bin_idz.end(),
00459               A_orig_bin_idz.begin());
00460   }
00461 
00462   bool
00463   get_bin_idz(const my_float_t *pt, int *idx) const 
00464   {
00465     if(A_bins_are_transformed){
00466       // use the normals to each plane and the lower corner as point on 
00467       // the plane
00468 
00469       // Get signed distance of point to each "lower" plane
00470       my_float_t signed_dist[3];
00471       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00472         my_float_t V[3];
00473         vector(3, pt, A_lower_corner, V);
00474         signed_dist[i] = dot(V, A_plane_normals + 3*i);
00475       }
00476 
00477       // Get the bin indices
00478       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00479         if(signed_dist[i] < 0.0) return false;
00480         idx[i] = static_cast<int>(std::floor(signed_dist[i] / A_bin_width));
00481         if(idx[i] >= A_num_bins[i]) return false;
00482       }
00483     }else{
00484       // Check if point falls outside the range of the bins
00485       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00486         if(pt[i] < A_lower_corner[i] || A_upper_corner[i] < pt[i])
00487           return false;
00488   
00489       // Compute the index for the bin containing the point
00490       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00491         idx[i] = static_cast<int>(std::floor((pt[i] - A_lower_corner[i]) 
00492                                              / A_bin_width));
00493         if(idx[i] >= A_num_bins[i]) return false;
00494       }
00495     }
00496     return true;
00497   }
00498 
00499   _Tp A_begin;
00500   _Tp A_end;
00501   bool A_bins_are_setup;
00502   my_float_t A_bin_width; 
00503   my_float_t A_bin_width_inv; 
00504  
00505   my_float_t A_upper_corner[3];
00506   my_float_t A_lower_corner[3];
00507   my_float_t A_orig_lower[3];   
00508   my_float_t A_orig_upper[3];   
00509   my_float_t A_plane_normals[9];
00510   bool A_bins_are_transformed;
00511 
00512   int A_num_bins[3];
00513   bin_vec A_bins;
00514   bin_vec A_bins_of_moved_pts;
00515   std::vector<three_idz> A_current_bin_idz;
00516   std::vector<three_idz> A_orig_bin_idz;
00517 
00518 };
